title: Vireo Health: Never Been More Upside
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: Vireo Health founder and CEO Dr. Kyle Kingsley returns to the show to talk huge opportunity in US as Arizona, New Mexico and New York legalize adult use cannabis. Legalization doesn't automatically improve your business unless you can scale on operational excellence. Compelling potential in Resurgent Biosciences - Vireo's IP business. Being on the path to profitability. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
